channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prediabetes remission possible without dropping pounds, new study finds
item.description: There's a long-held belief in diabetes prevention that weight loss is the main way to lower disease risk. Our new study challenges this.
